MajorClaims.MC1: Government should decide for punishment case by case basis
MajorClaims.MC2: it should taken into consideration the situation and conditions, that forces to a person to be a criminal

Claims.C2: it is necessary to have a look behind crime
Claims.C3: fixed punishment will reduce the time taken by judges to give their judgement and it will be effective economically for the Government
Claims.C4: fixed punishment will reduce the space between poor and rich people and everyone will understand the importance of each other
